entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
